summary: Extracts a spatial crop that encloses the foreground object of specified data entries, using a source field to compute a bounding box, optionally expanding it with margins, enforcing a minimum patch size, and padding if necessary; the crop coordinates and shape information are stored back into the associated metadata.
business_intent: Provide an automated way to focus on the relevant region of medical images during model training and inference, reducing computational load and handling cases where the foreground occupies only a small part of the volume.
